captions.text: How were you able to lift him with just one arm?
If that train reaches the main hub, it's all gonna blow!
What the!?  How did you know?
You stole this weapon from my company.
Did you think I wouldn't figure out how to turn it off?
Hang on just one second, I'm in the middle of a call.
I said, did you find the off switch, Mr. Wayne?
uh...Alright... did you find the off switch Mr. Batman?
Oh yeah, this is also my dad's train.
Ha HA ha ha HA ha HAhahahaa ha!
He stole your microwave emitter! hee hee hee!
And you... *chuckles* And you just turned it off!
That jerk burnt down my house.
You're lucky that microwave emitter didn't vaporize every living thing standing nearby
Oh I know!  That would have been more realistic, AND terrible!
So where are Ra's Al Ghul and the Scarecrow now?
Oh they're locked away in Arkham Asylum.
We wont be seeing them again.
So, the two of us broke out...
and he still thinks, we're locked in Arkham!
Why haven't we felt any effects?
Must be a compound that has to be absorbed through the lungs.
That explains why my wife flipped out on spaghetti night!
I came here to break up with you.
No.  Your face is your mask...
and the bat mask is your real face.
Because it's not what's underneath, but what you do...
and what you do now is Batman.
This is really confusing.  This IS my face!
Just like that is your face

comments.author: Diego Saavedra Agurto

comments.text:
*cough
Bruce hasn't ever killed, not in the movies nor the comics. He's epic 
because of his detective skills, peak physical and intellectual abilities, 
127 styles of martial arts, and being an epic billionaire with a manor and 
an epic butler/father.  He invented all his gadgets. Maybe not in the 
current films, but in every other circumstance. Nolan's goal was to make 
his universe more realistic, which is the reasoning. He probably has more 
layers than any other hero, with his extreme PTSD, being the reason for his 
dark, brooding rage and depression which he takes out as he puts on the 
bat-cowl. If you don't respect Bruce Wayne to the ultimate extent, you 
insignificant poster, please attempt to go through everything he has, and 
then come back to try and gain back your dignity and self-respect, because 
i'm not sensing any at the moment. When you go promote justice to the whole 
of Gotham, the most corrupted city in the world, and become one of the most 
well-known symbols on Earth, you may be taken into consideration of my 
worthy attention.﻿
